mapper.select: SELECT a.rest_num as rest_num, a.rest_time as rest_time, b.m_gender as m_gender, a.m_id as m_id, b.m_name as m_name, b.m_phone as m_phone, a.rest_totalprice as rest_totalprice,to_char(a.rest_hairdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rest_hairdate FROM reservation a inner join member b ON a.m_id = b.m_id WHERE a.rest_state = 1 and a.rest_hairdate = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY a.rest_time

SELECT a.rest_num as rest_num, a.des_num as des_num, a.m_id as m_id, to_char(a.rest_hairdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rest_hairdate, a.rest_time as rest_time, a.rest_state as rest_state, a.rest_memo as rest_memo, a.rest_comment as rest_comment, b.des_name as des_name, a.rest_totalprice as rest_totalprice FROM reservation a inner join designer b on a.des_num = b.des_num WHERE a.rest_num = #{rest_num}

SELECT a.rest_num as rest_num, a.des_num as des_num, a.m_id as m_id, to_char(a.rest_hairdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rest_hairdate, a.rest_time as rest_time, a.rest_state as rest_state, a.rest_memo as rest_memo, a.rest_comment as rest_comment, b.des_name as des_name, a.rest_totalprice as rest_totalprice,c.m_name as m_name, c.m_num as m_num, c.m_phone as m_phone FROM reservation a inner join designer b on a.des_num = b.des_num inner join member c on a.m_id = c.m_id
